title: Create Documentation Structure and Technical Setup Guide
description: Build the foundational documentation structure with technical setup instructions, prerequisites, and project architecture overview in Indonesian language
details: Create a comprehensive documentation file (README-ID.md or docs/frontend-documentation.md) that includes: 1) Technical setup prerequisites (Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4.0, shadcn/ui, React Query, Lucide React), 2) Project folder structure with detailed explanations, 3) Color palette and design system specifications, 4) Installation and configuration steps. Use the provided Indonesian content structure and ensure all technical specifications match the PRD requirements. Include code examples for the folder structure and configuration snippets.
test_strategy: Verify documentation completeness by checking all sections are present, technical specifications match PRD requirements, and Indonesian language is properly formatted. Test setup instructions by following them step-by-step.
ai_result: Created comprehensive frontend documentation structure with technical setup instructions, project architecture, color palette, and detailed configuration steps including TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4.0, and Next.js 15 setup

title: Document Public Website Architecture and Navigation
description: Create detailed documentation for the public website structure, navigation system, and page specifications including homepage, flora, fauna, and other public pages
details: Document the complete public website architecture including: 1) Header navigation structure with all menu items (Beranda, Taman, Flora, Fauna, Berita, Peta, Hubungi), 2) Homepage hero section with CTAs and featured content sections, 3) Database pages (Flora/Fauna) with search, filter, and pagination specifications, 4) Detail page structures with TypeScript interfaces, 5) Chatbot integration specifications with API endpoints and features. Include TypeScript interface definitions for all components and props as shown in the task description.
test_strategy: Review documentation against PRD requirements to ensure all public pages are covered, TypeScript interfaces are complete and accurate, and navigation structure matches the specified design.
ai_result: Created detailed public website architecture documentation with complete component implementations, TypeScript interfaces, navigation structure, and chatbot integration specifications

title: Document Admin CMS System and Role-Based Access Control
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the admin dashboard architecture, role-based navigation, and permission systems for both Super Admin and Regional Admin roles
details: Document the complete admin system including: 1) Dashboard layout structure with sidebar navigation and main content area, 2) Super Admin navigation menu with full permissions (create, read, update, delete, approve, reject) for all content types, 3) Regional Admin limited navigation with scope restrictions, 4) Dashboard overview page specifications with summary cards and activity feeds, 5) TypeScript interfaces for navigation structures and permission systems. Include detailed permission matrices and role-based access patterns as specified in the task content.
test_strategy: Validate documentation covers all admin roles, permission levels are clearly defined, navigation structures are complete, and TypeScript interfaces match the RBAC requirements from the PRD.
ai_result: Created comprehensive Admin CMS system documentation with detailed RBAC implementation, role-based navigation, Super Admin and Regional Admin dashboards, and permission management system

title: Complete Documentation with Workflow, UI Components, and Integration Guides
description: Finalize the documentation by adding workflow management, UI/UX components, API integration patterns, and responsiveness/accessibility guidelines
details: Complete the documentation with remaining sections: 1) Workflow and data management processes (Draft → Pending Approval → Published/Rejected), 2) UI/UX component specifications using shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS, 3) API integration patterns with React Query and service layer architecture, 4) Responsiveness guidelines for mobile and desktop breakpoints, 5) Accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA) requirements and implementation guidelines. Ensure all sections are written in Indonesian and follow the established documentation structure and formatting.
test_strategy: Conduct final review to ensure documentation is complete, all sections from the task description are covered, formatting is consistent, and technical specifications align with PRD requirements. Verify Indonesian language quality and technical accuracy.
ai_result: Completed final documentation covering workflow management, UI/UX component library, API integration patterns, responsive design, accessibility compliance, and performance optimization guidelines
